__e: Why you slipped me your number in case I ever need to ask anything?
Ask her questions, get a statement.
But, honey, someone brought this by our stoop. And I just thought you should be somewhere safe when you found out.
If you don't benefit from her directly... I think that, if you wait a few years... then you will achieve them from me... as a token of my esteem.
I can't wait to bring that vampire up from the basement and watch the sun do him the justice that 2000 years of living couldn't.
And since we have been faithful to you, we know that you will send us some good fortune one of these days, even though you sure as hell seem to be taking your sweet time.
We need to find a way to get a message to my father.
I guess the best we can do is bring these back to his family.
Poor Oharles had been helpless. Not even able to send me a message of farewell.
